P = 2*(25m + 15m) = 2*(40m) = 80 meters.

So, the total perimeter is 80 meters.

Now, if posts are placed every 2 meters, I can find the number of posts by dividing the perimeter by the distance between posts. So, 80m / 2m = 40 posts.
